lines.text: Flash, Flash, I love you, but we only have fourteen hours to save the Earth!
GORDON'S ALIVE!
Bring me... the bore worms!
No! Not the bore worms!
We're going to empty your memory as we might empty your pockets... Doctor.
Don't empty my mind! Please, I beg you! My mind is all I have! I've spent my whole life trying to fill it!

[watching Zarkov's memories of Hitler at a Nazi Party rally]
Now, he showed promise!
General Kala, Flash Gordon approaching.
What do you mean 'Flash Gordon approaching'?
On a Hawkman rocket cycle. Shall I inform His Majesty?
Imbecile! The Emperor would shoot you for interrupting his wedding with this news! Fire when Gordon's in range!
[Flash is on a Hawkman rocket cycle and escapes]
He's escaping, idiot! Dispatch war rocket 'Ajax' to bring back his body!
Freeze, you bloody bastards!

[attempts to use her ring to open the door, it doesn't respond]
They've changed the code!
I've changed too, Aura.
And I've changed, too.
Oh, it's okay. I think I can work it out.
[starts to use Princess Aura's ring at different angles on the door]
I love you. Will you marry me?
I don't know, we'll try...
[breaks away as Barin moves in to kiss her]
Not now, Barin...!
You haven't changed...
If I'm not at the wedding, I'll be shot

[Finally manages to picks the electronic door lock with Aura's ring]
A-ha! I thought it was one of the prime numbers of the Zenith series. *I* haven't changed.
Flash... when the ship hits the forcefield you'll be killed; this is suicide!
No Vultan... it's a rational transaction! One life for billions...
This Ming is a psycho!
This Ming is a psycho.
Who said that?
The fair-haired prisoner.
Who are you?
Flash Gordon. Quarterback. New York Jets.
Dale Arden, Your Highness. Live and let live, that's my motto.
Prince Barin! I'm not your enemy, Ming is! And you know it yourself. Ming is the enemy of every creature of Mongo! Let's all team up and fight him.
Look! Water is leaking from her eyes.
It's what they call tears, it's a sign of their weakness.
Do you, Ming the Merciless, Ruler of the Universe, take this Earthling Dale Arden, to be your Empress of the Hour?
Of the hour, yes.
Do you promise to use her as you will?
Certainly!
Not to blast her into space?
[Ming glares at Zogi]
Uh, until such time as you grow weary of her.
I do.
I do NOT!
Freeze! Yer bloody bastards!

[to Zarkov]
Tell me more about this man Houdini.
Biro's hit! I'm going in after him!
[flies off]
Grrrr! Impetuous boy!
Ah, well; who wants to live forever?

[laughs heartily, to the Hawkmen]
DIVE!
I'm flying blind on a rocket-cycle!
[first lines]
Klytus, I'm bored. What play thing can you offer me today?
An obscure body in the S-K System, Your Majesty. The inhabitants refer to it as the planet Earth.
How peaceful it looks.
[He activates a console, and watches as earthquakes, floods, etc. start to occur. They both get a good laugh out of it]
Most effective, Your Majesty. Will you destroy this Earth?
Later. I like to play with thing a while before annihilation.
[laughs evilly]
We are only interested in friendship. Why do you attack us?

Why not? Pathetic earthlings. Hurling your bodies out into the void, without the slightest inkling of who or what is out here. If you had known anything about the true nature of the universe, anything at all, you would've hidden from it in terror.
But my father has never kept a vow in his life!
I can't help that, Aura. Keeping our word is one of the things that make us... better than you.
My thanks to you, Flash.
What for?
For giving an old bird a second chance!

[to Flash]
Welcome back from the grave.
[to Princess Aura]
I knew you were up to something, though I'll confess I hadn't thought of necrophilia?

[pulling a gun on Munson]
Get your toothbrush and whatever!
[Flash is in chains and with a helmet over his head]
I demand to see the governor! I can hardly breathe in this thing!
Yes, you don't look well. I'm told you refused your final meal. The chef will be upset.
Tell 'em to go to hell!
Maybe just as well. Gas works more quickly on an empty stomach. Any final requests?
Yes, let me see Dale. Right away.
Oh, dear. How pathetic. Yes, I anticipated that.
This isn't happening, Dale. We're not here. It's just a bad dream.
Oh, I agree completely. We'll wake up in any minute in Dock Harbor and have a laugh about this.
Only this time I won't just ask the maitre d' your name. I'll walk over and talk to you.
You promise?
I promise. Cross my heart and hope to... I really will talk to you, Dale.
Where am I?
Back from the dead. I've saved you.
My God! How?
By magic, of course. With a kiss, because I like you.
Klytus! Are your men on the right pills? Maybe you should execute their trainer!
Should we stop the torture?
No.
Father! Damn you, Father!
[Flash is using football moves to fight Ming's soldiers]
Klytus! What is he doing?
I don't know, sir! It looks like some kind of barbaric sport!
Fly back to your kingdom. You may see me sooner than you think.
[kisses Barin]
Lying bitch.
Onward my brave Hawkmen! Let this be known forever as Flash Gordon's Day!
I'm a New York City girl. It's a little too quiet around here for me.
24 in the morning, and there's no sun!
What do you find? The moon out of orbit?
By more than 12 degrees. This must be some sort of mistake.
No, it's no mistake... IT'S AN ATTACK! I've been right all these years!
Look at them! The poor wretches are just waiting for someone to lead them in revolt...!

[annoyed]
Oh, are you looking at ME, Zarkov?

Every thousand years, I test each life system in the Universe. I visit it with mysteries, earthquakes, unpredicted eclipses, strange craters in the wilderness... If these are taken as natural, I judge that system ignorant and harmless - I spare it. But if the Hand of Ming is recognized in these events, I judge that system dangerous to us. I call upon the great god Dyzan, and for his greater glory...
[leans forward, smiling]
... and for our mutual pleasure...
[leans back again]
... I destroy it utterly.
You're saying... it's my fault the Earth is being destroyed?

[grinning]
Precisely... Doctor!
Did you enjoy yourselves in Sibaria? I understand you flew the doctor there last week. Klytus kindly fed me the information.
Klytus? He wants me himself. His agents are always making up lies about me.
It has no name. Many brave men died to bring it here from the Galaxy of Pleasure... It will make your nights with Ming more... agreeable.
Will it make me forget?
No, but it will make you not mind remembering.
Check the angular vector of the moon!
Long live Flash! You've saved your Earth. Have a nice day.

[leaps into the air]
Yeah!
The game's lost, Ming! Stop your attack on Earth and I'll spare your life!
You pitiful fool! My life is not for any Earthling to give or take!
[Ming attempts to hold back Flash with the power of his ring. Flash approaches unaffected and menaces Ming with his sword. Ming cowers]
Your power is fading, Ming!

[trying to turn over hourglass]
It won't turn over! It won't turn over!

[Flash is going to suicide ram Ming's palace, Vultan turns to Flash]
That must be one hell of a planet you men come from!
Not too bad.
Halt, Lizard Man! Escape is impossible! Surrender!

[War Rocket Ajax is under heavy laser fire from Mingo City. Cut to Int. Ajax Cockpit. Flash is at the controls. Vultan is just reaching a ladder to leave]
Come on, Flash! Come on! It's time to bail out!
Sorry, Vultan! I'm not coming!
What?
The rocketcycle's gone!
So, come on! I'll carry you!
Bail out, Vultan, before it's too late!
Flash,
[runs back to Flash]
are you crazy?
The fire's too heavy!
[pause]
You know we'll never make that opening with nobody at the wheel!
Come on! You'll be blown to pieces, Flash! It's suicide!
No, a rational transaction! One life for billions!

[Vultan grabs Flash's shoulders and shouts]
Come on! You'll be destroyed!

[shouts]
You loony bird!
[Pushes Vultan away]
Get outta here! They need you on the ground!

[Vultan holds out his right hand]
Well, good bye, Flash! It's been...!

[Flash shakes Vultan's hand]
I know! For me too, Vultan!

[Vultan heads back to the ladder and starts climbing]
Tell Dale
[pause]
I know it would've been good!

[shouts]
That must be one hell of a planet you men come from!
Not too bad!
The tributes of the Hawkmen will be first.
Are we dreaming?
I'd like to think so.
The fabled ice jewel of Frigia; we seized it in battle from the royal crypt.
Stop! The ice jewel is our tribute, not Vultan's.
Vultan stole it while we were burying our dead on Frigia
Liar!
You are a thief!
What?
[Prince Barin draws his sword, preparing to attack Vultan]
[Vultan raises his clubbed sword]
Aargh!
Put down your weapons! No one, but no one, dies in the palace without a command from the Emperor.
Hail, Ming!
[Barin lowers his sword]
Aargh!
Vultan! You obey, or you sacrifice your daughter.
[Vultan's daughter emerges, looks at her father]

[lowers his club sword relentingly]
Hail, Ming.
Now the tributes from Ardentia.
Your Majesty, we, the people of Ardentia, we have suffered since you blasted our kingdom. I can offer you nothing this year, except my loyalty.
Prince Thun, we prize nothing more highly. And tell us, how great is this loyalty to your emperor?
Without measure.
We are delighted to hear it; fall on your sword.
Show us this loyalty, throw yourself onto your sword.

[Prince Thun unsheathes his sword]
May this deed of Prince Thun be an example to all the kingdoms of Mongo; death to Ming!
[Prince Thun is stopped by a freeze beam from Ming's servant]
[Ming disembowels and slays Prince Thun with his own sword]
Ugh!
I'd much rather see you on my side, than scattered into... atoms.
Open fire! All weapons, now! Charge the lightning field! I take personal responsibility in the Emperor's name!
Just hold me two seconds, then drop me so I can kiss the ground.
[Munson refuses to go aboard Zarkov's rocket ship]
I swear, Munson, I'll shoot!
Get shot or go up in that thing? What's the difference?
This way, you'll be giving your life to save the Earth! Haven't you any spirit at all?
NO!

[to dead Munson]
Sorry, Munson. Missed your opportunity.

[incredulous]
What is this?

[proud]
Humanity.
Madness!

[dreamily]
Oh, Flash!
No one, but no one dies in the palace without a command from the Emperor.
[Hawkman Biro has been injured during the attack on war rocket Ajax]
Biro! You alright?
They just winged me!
The red pedal!
Listen! There is something finer in this galaxy than Ming's law!
RUBBISH!
They were brave creatures Vultan.
SHUT UP!
With respect. The men who rid us of Klytus should not be deserted.
Will you shut up! So. Maybe I'd do it different. If I had it over again.
Then FIGHT!
But there's no way I could help a man who's dead!
My God!
What is this, a civic reception?
More like a police state.
If it is, that could be our good luck.
Why?
It means we'll find allies on every side. Look at them, the poor wretches are just waiting for someone to lead them in revolt.
Are you looking at me, Zarkov?
Yes.
Please, stop talking about revolts, I just want to get back home alive.
So that's why they let us escape; Klytus thought he'd wiped out your memory.
But do you know why it really failed?
I can't imagine.
As I was going under, I started to recite Shakespeare, the Talmud, the formulas of Einstein, anything I could remember, even a song from the Beatles.
It armored me, girl; they couldn't wipe those things away. You can't beat the human spirit!
Klytus?
Hmm?
